roleset.name: worthy of being hated
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7, relation to 'detest'.

example.name: arg1
example.text: Post a lousy photo , then bark around like a berserk dog , and then support yourself and exasperate 1.3 billion Chinese people , you American henchman are detestable to the point of being a bit cute !
example.arg: to the point of being a bit cute
